name: Santas Revenge
description:
This game was made for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021

Play as Reverse Santa stealing presents from testificates at Yoglabs that owe him money. This year Santa is going collecting.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Roll (can crush enemies with roll)

E - Interact

SHIFT - Sprint

LEFT MOUSE - Shoot

All art, programming, sfx and design was done by me (cyps)

Music was made by @rattnattt (on twitter)

This game was made using the Godot game engine
